units.title: Create hiPSC reporter line
units.text: AAVS1-FRT-flanked STOP-mKate2-HA reporter line was knocked into the AAVS1 safe harbor locus49 (Supplementary Results and Supplemen- tary Fig. 4a–f).
units.rationale: Defines the genetic construct used for lineage tracing.

units.title: Lentiviral transduction at day 15
units.text: hiPSCs were transduced with a lentiviral vector encoding FLP under the control of the CDH1 promoter at day 15 before analysis at day 24.
units.rationale: Introduces FLP recombinase for inducible labeling at a specific developmental stage.

units.title: Apply 4‑OHT during JCF stage
units.text: 4‑hydroxytamoxifen (4‑OHT) was applied at the beginning of the JCF stage (days 7–8; Fig. 4e and Extended Data Fig. 8a).
units.rationale: Activates the inducible FLP system to label JCF progenitors.

units.title: Confirm labeling after 72 h
units.text: After 72 h, we detected HA‑tag+CDH1+ cells, indicating correct labeling of the mesothelial layer (Extended Data Fig. 9b).
units.rationale: Verifies successful recombination and cell labeling.

units.title: Treat epicardioids with endothelin‑1
units.text: ET1‑treated epicardioids; control, n = 130 and 5 epicardioids; ET1, n = 106 transients per layer and 4 treated epicardioids and controls.
units.rationale: Induces stress‑induced hypertrophy for disease modeling.

units.title: Immunostaining for cTnT and FN1
units.text: Immunostaining for cTnT and FN1 in control and Noonan syndrome organoids (day 15).
units.rationale: Detects cardiomyocyte and fibrotic markers in treated organoids.

units.title: Calcium imaging with Fluo‑4
units.text: Exemplary Fluo‑4 traces in treated and control epicardioids. Blue arrows indicate 0.5‑Hz pacing, and red arrows indicate arrhythmic events.
units.rationale: Assesses functional electrophysiological changes after treatment.

units.title: Perform three independent differentiations
units.text: Three independent differentiations per group were performed.
units.rationale: Ensures reproducibility of the experimental conditions.

units.title: Statistical analysis with Kruskal–Wallis
units.text: Data were analyzed by Kruskal–Wallis test with a Dunn’s multiple comparisons test.
units.rationale: Provides appropriate statistical testing for multiple group comparisons.

units.title: Infer cell fate with CellRank
units.text: CellRank47 to infer the terminal macrostates (myocytic, epicardial, endothelial and endodermal) and the probability of each cell to transition toward these states based on both pseudotime and RNA velocity.
units.rationale: Computationally determines lineage trajectories from single‑cell data.
